coreAttributes.name: Imperial Singauta
coreAttributes.description:
A shield with a wicked spike at the bottom for both offense and defense, Commonly wielded with spears for versitility's sake, but could also be paired with a sword just as well. #IF game.isSillyModeEnabled() #THEN
" Should not be used as a sled. It works as a snowboard way better. " #ELSE
" The hande is positioned so you can strike using the tip, and block without changing your stance. " #ENDIF
coreAttributes.attackTooltipDescription: Attack using the tip of the shield.
coreAttributes.unequipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unequip)] the shield and put it away away.

hitDescriptions.hitText: Swiping wide with [npc.her] Shield, [npc.name] [npc.verb(manage)] to bash [npc2.name] in the chest; the shield slams into [npc2.her] torso and drains [npc.her] energy!
Striking out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] Shield, [npc.name] [npc.verb(manage)] to slam the shield into [npc2.her] [npc2.arm] and drain [npc2.her] energy!
With a quick step forwards, [npc.name] [npc.verb(lunge)] out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] Shield, sinking the bottom edge into [npc2.her] shoulder and causing [npc2.herHim] to lose some energy!

missDescriptions.missText: Thrusting out with [npc.her] Shield, [npc.name] [npc.verb(attempt)] to bash [npc2.name] in the chest, but [npc.verb(end)] up missing [npc2.herHim]!
Striking out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] Shield, [npc.name] [npc.verb(let)] out a frustrated cry as [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
With a quick step forwards, [npc.name] [npc.verb(lunge)] out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] Shield, but [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
